The calculation of health data depends on the following information, please enter it accurately

The target of blood pressure control is based on your personal information, medical history, and comprehensive evaluation through a data model. \ nIn order to ensure the accuracy of the evaluation, please update your personal information in "Settings" if there is any change occurred. \ nPlease ensure that you measure at least three times a day at different time periods, otherwise you will not be able to know whether you have achieved the target due to insufficient data. \ nIf you exceed the control range of blood pressure frequently, please consult a doctor in time.

Tap the button on the front of Mystrace to switch to the battery display. Press and hold the button until Mystrace vibrates and displays a 4 digits number. When the same number appears below, tap to select it.
The device is Vibrating, \n please tap the metal button again.
There are some information you previously set, you can use them on this device.
Your Mystrace is bound successfully. View the wearing guide?
Wearing your Mystrace correctly will help the device capture your pulse-wave effectively.
1. Please make sure your Mystrace is not connected to other mobile phones. \ n2. Please make sure your mobile phone has turned on Bluetooth.
Mystrace automatically measures your blood pressure every 1 hour, 24/7. You could set a measurement alarm (The alarm is on by default).
Mystrace automatically measures your blood pressure every 1 hour, 24/7. You could set a measurement alarm.
Set the information displayed on the device
Select the style of time display
Blood pressure is automatically measured every hour, 24 hours a day, you can set an auto-measurement vibration reminder. There is no need to open the app during automatic measurement.

After receiving the vibration reminder, please keep your body still and make sure your Mystrace is in the correct position. The position deviation will cause obvious deviations in the measurement results.

After receiving the vibration reminder, you can touch the front metal button of your Mystrace to start the measurement immediately. You could see the measurement progress and whether the measurement is successful on your Mystrace screen.
If you are unable to keep your body still (when you are exercising or in a vehicle), you can cancel this auto-measurement by touching the metal button for 3 seconds.
Please check your measurement results regularly through the app. When you open the app, the measurement data in the bracelet will be automatically synchronized to the app via Bluetooth.
Please go to Settings > Notifications in your Phone to modify.
Remind when less than %2$d or more than %1$d
Remind when less than %2$d\nor more than %1$d
Check if the band is connected to another phone?
Turn off the Bluetooth on another phone, and bind your Mystrace to your phone.
If your Mystrace has power, and still cannot find your Mystrace even when your phone is close to your Mystrace, try to restart your phone Bluetooth.
If restarting Bluetooth does not work, try to restart your phone.

I recently used a pulse cardiovascular monitoring bracelet, which not only can understand the changes of blood pressure in real time throughout the day. More than that, it can remind the drug, and can issue a warning when your blood pressure is abnormal . For the sake of good health, you can also have a try!
Please allow access to Phone Contacts
You need to wait for him(her) to agree

Send my Abnormal Alarm to him/her

* In order to ensure the normal functions, we are updating for you, please do not exit the app while updating.
Average residence time of blood flow
心率是指正常人安静状态下每分钟心跳的次数，也叫安静心率，一般为60～100次/分， 可因年龄、性别或其他生理因素产生个体差异。一般来说，年龄越小，心率越快，老年人心跳比年轻人慢，女性的心率比同龄男性快， 这些都是正常的生理现象。安静状态下，成人正常心率为60～100次/分钟，理想心率应为55～70次/分钟

收缩压（Systolic pressure）（高压）：是当心脏收缩时，从心室射入的血液对血管壁产生的侧压力， 这时血压最大；此时内壁的压力称为收缩压，亦称高压。\n\n 根据世界卫生组织规定，成人收缩压 ≥ 140mmHg（21.3kPa）时即可确诊为高血压。收缩压≤130mmHg（18.6kPa）称为正常血压， 介于二者之间者，称为临界高血压；所谓低血压，是指动脉血压的收缩压低于12千帕（90毫米汞柱）。不同年龄段、不同性别有不同差异。

舒张压就是当人的心脏舒张时，动脉血管弹性回缩时，产生的压力称为舒张压，又叫低压。 心脏舒张时，主动脉压下降，在心舒末期动脉血压处于最低值称为舒张压，成人正常的舒张压为 <90mmHg(12kpa)\n\n 根据世界卫生组织规定，成人舒张压 ≥ 95mmHg(12.6kPa)时，即可确诊为高血压。介于90mmHg~95mmHg之间者，称为临界高血压。不少青中年人， 由于工作劳累压力大，活动偏少；测血压收缩压正常，舒张压高于90毫米汞柱，有时脉压差很近，如：130/110毫米汞柱,病人主观感觉头晕、胸闷不适。 这是由于交感神经活性增高，周围血管阻力增高所致。是高血压病的早期阶段。
一个心动周期中动脉血压的平均值称为平均动脉压。正常成年人平均动脉压正常值为70~105mmHg。计算公式如下：平均动脉压= (收缩压+2×舒张压)/3。也可表示为：平均动脉压=舒张压+1/3脉压差。
指一次心搏，一侧心室射出的血量，简称搏出量\n\n左、右心室的搏出量基本相等。搏出量等于心舒末期容积与心缩末期容积之差值。 心舒末期容积（即心室充盈量）约130～145毫升，心缩末期容积（即心室射血期末留存于心室的余血量）约60～80毫升，故搏出量约65～70毫升。
心搏指数是以每平方米体表面积计算的心输出量。

每分钟一侧心室射出的血液总量，又称每分输出量。左、右心室的输出量基本相等。心室每次搏动输出的血量称为每搏输出量， 人体静息时约为70毫升（60～80毫升），如果心率每分钟平均为75次，则每分钟输出的血量约为5000毫升（4500～6000毫升），即每分心输出量。 通常所称心输出量，一般都是指每分心输出量。心输出量是评价循环系统效率高低的重要指标。心输出量在很大程度上是和全身组织细胞的新陈代谢 率相适应。

心输出量是评价循环系统效率高低的重要指标，为了便于在不同个体之间进行比较。一般多采用空腹和静息时每一平方米体表面积的 每分心输出量即心指数为指标：
一般成年人的体表面积约为1.6～1.7平方米。静息时每分心输出量为5～6升，故其心指数约为3.0～3.5升/分/平方米。
外周总阻力是反映脑血管床微循环通畅程度的定量指标。其定义为外周总阻力=Pm除以Qm。Pm和Qm分别表示平均压力和平均流量。 循环系统的外周总阻力（peripheral resistance）主要是指小动脉和微动脉对血流的阻力。临床许多脑血管疾病都与阻力血管的状态有关。血液粘度增高、 小血管痉挛、阻塞等均可引起RV值增高。
血管顺应性是指在压力或力的作用下使容积增大而不破裂的一种特性。它通常以压力改变一个单位时所对应的血管容积改变量, 即用dy/dP来表示,单位可为毫升/毫米汞(水)柱,顺应性是弹性模量的倒数。
血容量是指血细胞容量与血浆容量的总和 有效循环血量是指单位时间内通过心血管系统进行循环的血量， 但不包括贮存于肝、脾和淋巴血窦中或停滞于毛血管中的血量。简单的说就是参与心血管血液循环的血容量。
血液粘性是一个综合性指数，它是血浆粘度、血细胞压（比）积、红细胞变形性和聚集能力、血小板和白细胞流变特性的综合表现， 是血液随不同流动状况（切变率）及其他条件而表现出的粘度，切变率低时血粘度高，随切变率的逐渐升高粘度逐渐下降，最后趋向一个平稳的数值。

\u26a0 Note: The value of a single measurement is only for reference only, please do not be too anxious. Cardiovascular health management requires you to wear Mystrace consistently and monitor your numerical trends continuously. It is better to ask doctors to help you analyze your measure results comprehensively and combine them with clinical checks to make an accurate diagnosis.

Tap \"START\" button, then hold the front metal button on Mystrace with your right thumb. Keep your body still until the ECG measurement ends. Please be careful not to touch your hands during measurement.

It is recommended to measure ECG with both hands: take off your Mystrace first, then hold the front metal button with your right hand finger, and hold the back metal electrode with your left hand finger. Wet fingers will improve measurement accuracy.
A properly measured ECG should look similar to the picture.
No valid pulse wave signal detected \ nPlease adjust the wearing position of your Mystrace or the tightness of the wristband according to the Wearing Guide.

Your device will vibrate for 4 seconds after starting the search. \nLow battery will cause the device to shut down during the search process.
Add your first medication schedule now.
Please wear this device on the inside of your left wrist to ensure the accuracy of your measurements.
When do I need to take an ECG?

The ECG can provide doctors with more valuable information when you have heart discomforts such as chest pain, chest tightness, and palpitations, to help doctors diagnose these symptoms in depth. If you have any abnormal symptoms such as stagnation, heartache, dizziness, cold sweats, etc., please contact your doctor in time and measure ECG under their guidance.
Guide for syncing Health Weekly to your WeChat.
It is recommended to update your app to the latest version for a better experience.
This classification is based on the upper arm blood pressure values collected on seated persons who have been sitting for more than 5 minutes\n

There is a close relationship between blood pressure levels and the risk of cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, such as stroke, coronary heart disease events, heart failure, atrial fibrillation, and end-stage renal disease. \n24-hour dynamic blood pressure, nocturnal blood pressure, and early morning blood pressure are more closely and significantly related to the risk of cardiovascular and cerebrovascular disease.
Source: 2018 Chinese Guidelines for Prevention and Treatment of Hypertension\n

It is generally considered that low blood pressure is not dangerous unless you experience the following negative symptoms, including decreased vision, nausea, dehydration, dizziness, distraction, fatigue, lethargy and so on.
The adult resting pulse evaluation is not suitable for the situations like, you feel unwell, nervous, or have just exercised.

Congratulations! Your pulse is normal. Please keep exercise and a healthy diet to keep your heart healthy. This helps to maintain or even reduce your pulse, you know, well-trained athletes\' pulse can be as low as 41 bpm.
Your pulse is lower than average. This is a sign of good cardiovascular heath.

Your pulse is above average. If you have just exercised, your pulse may be high. A high pulse indicates that your cardiovascular system may be sub-healthy, and proper exercise and a healthy diet can reduce your pulse and improve your health. If the pulse continues to be high, please consult a doctor.
A persistently low pulse may be a sign of cardiovascular dysfunction. Please consult a doctor to rule out potential health hazards.
You have not activated emergency services.
Find me by searching my phone number.
In order to provide you with a better user experience, Mystrace may need to apply for the following mobile phone system permissions in specific scenarios.
To receive blood pressure notifications, medication reminders, etc. from you, your family and friends.
Allow Mystrace to have permission to access to Storage.
To help read stored ECG and share it to other applications. To help you save and read your photos.
Allow Mystrace to have permission to access to Location.
To search and connect the Mystrace through Bluetooth
Allow Mystrace to have permission to access to Camera.
To use the camera function in Mystrace.
Allow Mystrace to have permission to access to Contacts.
To find your family and friends who have registered a Mystrace account
the Statement About Mystrace and Privacy
I have read and agree to the
By touching AGREE, you indicate that you have read and agreed to the content above,
You will be redirected to a third-party service. Tapping "AGREE" means you have read and agreed.
, and the information you authorize will be passed on to third-party service providers

In order to provide you with health services, we also need to collect and use your following information: \ nDevice and network information. \ nPersonal information: including name, avatar, gender, date of birth, height, weight, medical history information, mobile phone number, and country/region, which can help us calculate your health data more accurately. With your authorization (optional), the customer service staff will actively contact you or invite you to become WeChat friends through your mobile phone number to provide you with Mystrace product support services to help you use Mystrace products and service better. \ nHealth data: including pulse wave graph, electrocardiogram graph, blood pressure, pulse, mean arterial pressure, cardiac output, blood viscosity, total peripheral resistance. \ nSports data: including exercise duration, steps, distance, and heat. \ nWe will not share or provide your personal information to third parties without your authorization. \ nIf you do not agree to the necessary permissions or functions above, or you do not agree to the collection and use of the information above, this application may not work properly, you can choose to uninstall this app/quit this app/go to your phone Settings> Privacy to turns off authorization to terminate the service.
For using Bluetooth normally. Bluetooth can be used to connect app to your Mystrace devices and use the hardware functions related to the devices.
For view stored Electrocardiogram graphics and forwarding them to other applications. For accessing your Photos to select and set one of them as your profile picture.
For taking a photo and setting it as your profile picture.
In order to match and recommend the contacts in your address book with the mobile phone numbers, if your friends and relatives registered in Mystrace, the system will notify you.
Allow the customer service to contact you through your registered mobile phone number or invite you to become WeChat friends to provide you with support services for the use of Mystrace products.

Welcome to Mystrace. You can use this app to record and analyze your health and exercise data. We will strictly abide by relevant laws and privacy policies to protect your personal information. In order to provide you with the services, this app needs to connect to the network and requires you to authorize the following permissions or functions:
In order to help you use Mystrace and the services better, we also need your authorization:
You need to agree to this Privacy Policy to continue using Mystrace
If you do not agree with this Privacy Policy, we regret that we will not be able to provide services to you
This permission must be turned on to ensure you can access Mystrace.
